Title: Requires the development of a training program to educate first responders on effective communication with deaf and hard of hearing individuals in emergency situations
Summary: Requires the state interagency coordinating council for services to persons who are deaf, deaf-blind, or hard of hearing to develop and implement a training program to educate first responders on effective communication with deaf and hard of hearing individuals in emergency situations.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to requiring the state interagency coordinating council for services to persons who are deaf, deaf-blind, or hard of hearing to develop and implement a training program to educate first responders on effective communication with deaf and hard of hearing individuals in emergency situations
